name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Soundtrack
summary:
Music Director: Marcin Przybyłowicz
Music composed by Marcin Przybyłowicz, Mikolai Stroinski
Additional music by Percival

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Main Theme Eredin's / Wild Hunt Theme
Orchestrated by David Christiansen
Orchestra conducted by Bernd Ruf
Performed by Brandenburgisches Staatsorchester Frankfurt
Mixed by Dynamedion, Marcin Przybyłowicz

Original Witcher theme composed by Adam Skorupa, Paweł Błaszczak

Performers
Christina Bogdanowa: Hammered Dulcimer, Percussion, Vocals
Katarzyna Bromirska: Accordion, Kemenche, Mandolin, Cello, Electric Cello, Flutes, Percussion, Violin, Vocals
Joanna Lacher:	Percussion, Vocals
Mikołaj Rybacki: Bouzouki, Mandolin, Saz, Percussion, Vocals
Robert Jaworski: Lute, Hurdy Gurdy, Renaissance Fiddle, Bowed Gusli
Amir Yaghmai: Kemenche, Violin, Yaylı tanbur, Gheychak
Jenny Takamatsu: Violin
Andrew Duckles: Viola

RED Witches Choir:
Karolina Kuzia
Paulina Łukiewska
Karolina Niewęgłowska
Magdalena Oracz-Chomiuk
Agnieszka Patyk
Karolina Stachyra
Ewa Stiller
Agnieszka Szóstak
Daria Zawada

Recorded at Sound and More
Recording Engineer: Rafał Smoleń

Mastering: Mark Evans @ Canyon Studios, Los Angeles, CA

---

Composed by:
Marcin Przybyłowicz - 01, 02, 03, 07, 09, 14, 16, 21, 29, 31, 32
Mikolai Stroinski - 04, 05, 06, 08, 11, 13, 15, 17, 18, 20, 23, 24, 25, 27, 28
Marcin Przybyłowicz & Percival - 10, 19, 30, 33, 34, 35
Percival - 12, 22, 26

Tracks 22, 26 Arranged and Produced by Marcin Przybyłowicz

Included with the GOG version of the game in both FLAC and MP3 codecs (soundtrack available for download before the game's release date).
info:
• 中文名: 巫师3：狂猎 游戏原声集
  • 作曲: Marcin Przybyłowicz、Mikolai Stroinski、Percival、Adam Skorupa、Paweł Błaszczak
  • 作词: Julian Tuwim
  • 编曲: Marcin Przybyłowicz, David Christiansen
  • 版本特性: Soundtrack
  • 发售日期: 2015-05-11
  • 播放时长: 81:24
